name: Six Months Demo
description:
Six Months is an in-development interactive novel. It is a sequel to Swan Hill, a twine story you can find here. Swan Hill takes most readers ten to fifteen minutes to play.

Six Months is slow-burning, low-key fantasy fiction in a world where magic is rare and ethically dubious. It's a murder mystery about power, family, and faking it until you make it. If you like Swan Hill, you can expect the final version of Six Months to be more of the same.

Play the Six Months Demo online here.

You can download the Six Months demo below. This demo can run locally in your browser. Please feel free to cannibalize any of its code or CSS modifications. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me on twitter.

Content heads-up: this story contains cursing and some violence and is not appropriate for children.
